message: ok so i am on a mac and my friend has gotten it on his pc, so he started a server and we just want to play once and awhile on his server so is there a way i can play minecraft without buying it? **noob** we are starting to get curious and with summer around the corner just want to see what it is about

I would advise you buy it. If you've any OCD strains or any grandiose building strains in your head, you're golden. You can even farm things, if you'd rather that. The really old alpha versions are still available around the net, so you can check out what it used to be.
Yeah, there's no real way around buying it. It's fairly inexpensive, and you'll surely get your money's worth.
